name: A Date With Markiplier: VN Edition
name_original: A Date With Markiplier: VN Edition
description:
--WARNING! VERY WIP AND VERY UNPOLISHED!! THIS IS MY FIRST TIME USING REN'PY,  ADVICE APPRECIATED!--

Have you ever played A Date With Markiplier and thought, 'Golly gee, this just doesn't have enough interactivity!' ? Well then what's wrong with you Then this is the game for you! It has way more interactivity and story to it, and it's all in a visual novel!
